DOC.brief_summary: Dendritic cell ( DC ) play central role activation T-cell responses show immunogenic preclinical vivo vitro assay . The aim study assess efficacy therapeutic vaccination pilot clinical trial Genotype 1 HCV patient use autologous DC transduce recombinant adenovirus encode NS3
DOC.brief_title: Phase I-II Vaccination Autologous Dendritic Cells Transduced With Adenoviral Vector Encoding NS3 Hepatitis C Encoding NS3 Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Chronic hepatitis C ( genotype 1b ) previously fail Interferon/Ribavirinbased treatment Liver cirrhosis HBVcoinfection Bilirubin > 1.5 time ULN ALT > 7 ULN Hepatocellular carcinoma Immunodeficiency
